meanings.definition: A mythical serpent with a head at each end.
meanings.sent1: Legends tell of fierce amphisbaenas lurking in the dark forests.
meanings.sent2: The ancient tale described an amphisbaenas with two heads.
meanings.sent3: In the story, the hero encountered an amphisbaenas that argued with itself.
meanings.sent4: The amphisbaenas in the legend symbolized duality and balance.
meanings.sent5: Children shivered at the thought of the monstrous amphisbaenas.

meanings.sent1: Scientists study the behavior of amphisbaenas in their natural habitat.
meanings.sent2: The zoo had a special exhibit featuring the rare amphisbaenas.
meanings.sent3: The amphisbaenas at the reptile park always made visitors smile.
meanings.sent4: The agility of the amphisbaenas amazed the onlookers.
meanings.sent5: The documentary showcased the fascinating life of amphisbaenas.
